document.discussion_title: Experian plc (EXPN) Stock Rating Reaffirmed by BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet Experian plc (LON:EXPN) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating reaffirmed by equities researchers at BNP Paribas in a research note issued to investors on Monday. They presently have a GBX 1,450 ($18.67) target price on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price target indicates a potential downside of 3.65% from the stock’s current price. Shares of Experian plc ( LON:EXPN ) opened at 1512.00 on Monday. The stock has a 50 day moving average price of GBX 1,475.66 and a 200-day moving average price of GBX 1,299.24. The stock’s market cap is GBX 14.30 billion. Experian plc has a 52 week low of GBX 1,017.00 and a 52 week high of GBX 1,543.00. Several other research firms have also recently issued reports on EXPN. Barclays PLC upped their price objective on Experian plc from GBX 1,350 ($17.38) to GBX 1,550 ($19.96) and gave the stock an “overweight” rating in a research report on Tuesday, July 12th. Deutsche Bank AG boosted their target price on Experian plc from GBX 1,315 ($16.93) to GBX 1,540 ($19.83) and gave the company a “buy” rating in a report on Tuesday, July 12th. Shore Capital reissued a “hold” rating on shares of Experian plc in a report on Tuesday, July 12th. HSBC boosted their target price on Experian plc from GBX 1,010 ($13.01) to GBX 1,100 ($14.16) and gave the company a “reduce” rating in a report on Tuesday, July 26th. Finally, Credit Suisse Group AG reissued an “outperform” rating and issued a GBX 1,505 ($19.38) target price on shares of Experian plc in a report on Wednesday, August 3rd. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, four have given a hold rating and eleven have given a buy rating to the company’s stock. Experian plc presently has an average rating of “Buy” and a consensus price target of GBX 1,407.08 ($18.12). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/experian-plc-expn-stock-rating-reaffirmed-by-bnp-paribas/ In other news, insider Cassin ,Brian sold 29,431 shares of the stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, June 6th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 1,304 ($16.79), for a total transaction of £383,780.24 ($494,180.07). Experian plc is an information services company. The Company provides data and analytical tools to clients around the world. The Company’s segments include Credit Services, Decision Analytics, Marketing Services and Consumer Services. The Company gathers information on past and present credit commitments, such as loans, leases and credit cards, and offers lenders to understand whether people and businesses can manage their debt repayments.
